name: express-ts-router
description: ExpressJs Promise Router for Typescript and Javascript
author: Lostfields

scripts.release: cross-var "tsc && rm .gitignore && git add --force ./lib/ && git commit -a -m $npm_package_version && git tag -a $npm_package_version -m $npm_package_version && git push origin $npm_package_version && git reset --hard origin/master && git pull origin master"
